title: naLiNakaanthimathim
sahitya:
nalinakAntimatim namAmyaham sadA 
(nalina)

anupallavi

sundara bhairavi suhAsini mandahAsa vadana sukumAri

caraNam 1

sugandha puSpAlankrta sundari vasantabhairavi sukumAri kEdAra nAtha priyankari

caraNam 2

sAmagAnapriya shyAmalEshvari samAna rahita sAvitri
sOmashEkhara priya sAvEri kOmaLAngi
nIrajAkSi nirmalAkAri nitya hamsanAdOllAsini Ashrta bhadra kannAvara atishaya shrI lalitAmbikA

caraNam 3

shankarAbharaNa shakti sakala shAstrArcita cAmuNDEshvari shankari
sankaTa hAriNi pankajAkSi parama pAvani sAramati
unnata umayAmbikA ubhaya lOka rakSaki bAgEshvari
nArAyaNi shAradA dEvi AdhAra nAyaki nara sUrArcita Anandabhairavi
saha sakalavalli caturbhuja nAyaki vANI sarasvati
kaliyuga varapradAyini hamsadhvani bhUshita niranjani
